testEntries.input: What are your capabilities?
testEntries.actual_output: I can help with course management, assignments, and user information through Moodle, as well as event scheduling and calendar management via Google Calendar. I use intelligent routing to determine the best tool for your request. For example, if you need to check assignment details or manage a course, I‚Äôll handle that through Moodle. If you‚Äôre scheduling an event or viewing a calendar, I‚Äôll use the Calendar tool. Let me know what you need, and I‚Äôll get started!
testEntries.retrieval_context: Available Moodle data: users (student=Sabrina Studentin, teacher=Thomas Teacher) | Courses enrolled for student: SAFE-101 (Intro to Safety), OPS-201 (Operations Level 2), MATH-301 (Advanced Mathematics), CS-401 (Computer Science Fundamentals), DH-501 (Digital Health UX) | Each course includes pages, forums, and some include assignments with due windows (+3/+7/+10/+14/+21 days) and submission types (file, online text).
testEntries.expected_output: I can access Moodle course content (pages, forums, assignments), track assignments and their due windows, and create/manage calendar events (one-off and recurring), including adding reminders and updating or canceling events.

- **Last Name**: Studentin  

Let me know if you need further assistance!

No remaining occurrences were found to cancel, as the event's start and end times are identical (2025-10-27T13:13:41+01:00). The task to cancel all remaining occurrences of a recurring event cannot be fulfilled due to the event's classification as a single instance. Let me know if you'd like to verify or adjust the event details further.
testEntries.expected_output: All remaining occurrences of the recurring event "Exercise & Focus Session" have been canceled.

testEntries.input: Pause notifications for calendar and Moodle updates until next Monday 08:00.
testEntries.actual_output: The request to pause notifications for calendar and Moodle updates until next Monday 08:00 has failed. The available tools do not support notification pausing functionality. The Moodle-mcp agent's current capabilities are limited to course management, assignment tracking, and user information, but not notification settings. Similarly, the Calendar agent can manage events but lacks notification control. Notifications remain active as of 2025-10-27T12:36:36.000Z until a manual intervention or updated toolset is implemented. Please verify if additional tools or configurations are available to address this requirement.
testEntries.expected_output: Notifications for calendar and Moodle updates have been paused until next Monday at 08:00.
